channel.title: postman on Twilio API Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in postman on Twilio API Explorer

item.title: Conversations
item.description: Create and manage conversations. Create console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/conversations\/create-conversation.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Lookup v1
item.description: The Lookup API provides a way to retrieve additional information about a phone number. NUMBER Performs basic phone number validation and conversion from regional formatting to E.164 (free). console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/lookup\/number.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Numbers v1
item.description: Phone Numbers API lets you search for available numbers, purchase and manage numbers. ACTIVE List all active phone numbers. console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/phone-numbers\/incoming.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Services

item.title: Numbers v2 - Available
item.description: The new Global Phone Numbers Catalog API lets you search for available numbers to purchase and to manage active numbers. TYPE Search for available phone numbers by type (e.g. local, mobile, tollfree, shortcode.) console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/phone-numbers-v2\/available-type.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Numbers v2 - Active
item.description: The new Global Phone Numbers Catalog API lets you search for available numbers to purchase and to manage active numbers. LIST List all active phone numbers. Optionally filter by PhoneNumber, Geography, and Type (e.g. local, mobile, tollfree, shortcode.) console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/phone-numbers-v2\/active-list.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Feedback
item.description: How to send and fetch messages with the Twilio Messaging API. PROVIDE FEEDABACK Send an SMS for which to provide feedback with ProvideFeedback=true param. console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/api-params\/feedback\/create.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Test Credentials
item.description: How to send messages with test credentials to simulate different responses. This API uses the test credentials and test phone numbers described here. SUCCESS console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/api-params\/test\/success.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Verify
item.description: How to add user verification to your web application with Twilio Verify. Create a Verification Service (once), Send OTP, Check OTP. CREATE console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/api-params\/verify\/create.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .
